item.title: DAL
item.description: score:-75 Chances: Delta Air Lines (DAL) is expanding its flight offerings to tourist-friendly destinations in Latin America and the Caribbean, opening up new revenue opportunities in popular travel markets. The revamping of American Express’s co-branded credit cards with Delta Air Lines is expected to attract and retain frequent fliers and everyday spenders, potentially boosting customer loyalty and card usage.
